resources.string: Don\'t Protect Me Against Bad Moves
No valid move, which will result in a winning board, was found after several attempts. Maybe you made a mistake earlier. Try using the Undo button to back up and try again.
Start a new game before asking for a hint!
Failed to create a board. Try again?
That selection either causes another cell to not have any valid entries available or is already set on another relevant cell. Please try a different number.
With a regular press you can set the number that you want to assign to this cell.\n\nUse a long press to note possible values for the cell and/or mark this cell as a pivot point.

With a long press you can make note of possible values that might be valid for this cell, or clear those notes later. You can also mark this cell as a pivot point so you can remember where you want to test multiple possible values.\n\nUse a regular press to assign a value to the cell.
There was an unknown error. Please try again.
There are no moves to undo.
Please start a new game and make a move before trying to undo.
